text: Devitɨn gumaziba kamaghɨn a mɨgei, “Aria. Datɨrɨghɨn nɨn dughiar aghuim, Ikiavɨra Itir God an gun nɨ mɨkemegha gɨfa, a nɨn apanim nɨn agharim darɨgham. Eghtɨ nɨ arazir manamɨn a damusɨ a damu.” Ezɨ Devit nɨmɨra an amuda ghua, Solɨn boroghɨn ghugha, an korotiar ruarimɨn vɨn an avɨzir mam atu, ezɨ Sol fozir puvatɨ.
